trans-unit.source: Represents an Active Directory role in a Windows Workflow Foundation hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un ruolo Active Directory in un ambiente host di Windows Workflow Foundation.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: In genere, l'archivio di Active Directory è utilizzato per archiviare informazioni organizzative sul personale.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> serve principalmente per eseguire query su informazioni organizzative per ragioni aziendali.

trans-unit.source: Active Directory roles typically correspond to a job function, title, or job skill within the context of the organization.
trans-unit.target: I ruoli Active Directory corrispondono in genere a una funzione del processo, un titolo o una competenza del processo all'interno del contesto dell'organizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains all the roles that report to the current role either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> contenente tutti i ruoli che riportano direttamente o indirettamente al ruolo corrente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains all the roles that either directly or indirectly report to the current role.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> contenente tutti i ruoli che riportano direttamente o indirettamente al ruolo corrente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A> returns all nodes below the current node.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A> restituisce tutti i nodi di livello inferiore rispetto al nodo corrente.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> to return only the nodes that are directly below the current node.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> per restituire solo i nodi di livello direttamente inferiore rispetto al nodo corrente.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains all the roles that report directly to the current role.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> contenente tutti i ruoli che riportano direttamente al ruolo corrente.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains all the roles that directly report to the current role.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> contenente tutti i ruoli che riportano direttamente al ruolo corrente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> returns only the nodes that are directly below the current node.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetDirectReports%2A> restituisce solo i nodi di livello direttamente inferiore rispetto al nodo corrente.

trans-unit.source: To return all nodes below the current node use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per restituire tutti i nodi di livello inferiore rispetto al nodo corrente utilizzare la classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetAllReports%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the generic collection that contains all <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> objects associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una raccolta contenente tutti gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> associate alla classe corrente <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: The generic <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> collection that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> associata alla classe corrente <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A role can be a general collection of security objects.
trans-unit.target: Un ruolo può essere una raccolta generale di oggetti di sicurezza.

trans-unit.source: As such, a role can contain multiple identities, for example use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> to return all directory objects associated with the role.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, un ruolo può contenere più identità, ad esempio utilizzare <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> per restituire tutti gli oggetti della directory associati al ruolo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic list of the Windows NT accounts associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un elenco generico di account Windows NT associati a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A generic list of values that represent the Windows NT accounts associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Elenco generico di valori che rappresentano gli account Windows NT associati all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetIdentities%2A> obtains all <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> objects associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> and converts each of them into a string value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetIdentities%2A> ottiene tutti gli oggetti <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> associati a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> e converte ognuno di loro in un valore stringa.

trans-unit.source: Returns an Active Directory role that contains information about the manager of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un ruolo Active Directory contenente informazioni sul gestore della classe corrente <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains information about the manager of the current role.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> contenente informazioni sul gesture del ruolo corrente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A> returns the direct manager for the current role.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>restituisce il gestore diretto per il ruolo corrente.

trans-unit.source: To return all roles above the current node, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per restituire tutti i nodi di livello superiore rispetto al nodo corrente utilizzare la classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the Active Directory role that contains information about the managerial chain associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il ruolo Active Directory contenente informazioni sulla catena di gestione associata alla classe corrente <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains information about the managerial chain associated with the current role.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> contenente informazioni sulla catena di gestione associata al ruolo corrente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A> returns all nodes above the current role.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManagerialChain%2A> restituisce tutti i nodi di livello superiore rispetto al ruolo corrente.

trans-unit.source: To return just the direct manager of the current role, use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per restituire solo il gestore diretto del ruolo corrente, utilizzare <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetManager%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an Active Directory role that contains information about all the directory operations that are supervised by the manager of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un ruolo Active Directory contenente informazioni su tutte le operazioni di una directory sotto la supervisione del gestore della classe corrente <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that contains information about all directory operations that are supervised by the manager of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> contenente informazioni su tutte le operazioni di una directory sotto la supervisione del gesture della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> returned contains information from all objects managed by the manager of this role but does not contain this information from the current role.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> restituita contiene informazioni provenienti da tutti gli oggetti gestiti dal gestore di questo ruolo ma non contiene le informazioni provenienti dal ruolo corrente.

trans-unit.source: Returns a generic list of <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> objects associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un elenco generico di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> associati all'elemento <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: A generic list of <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> objects associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Elenco generico di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> associati all'elemento <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetSecurityIdentifiers%2A> checks each <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> method to see if the entry has a security identifier in its <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetSecurityIdentifiers%2A> controlla ogni <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> restituita dal metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetEntries%2A> per verificare se la voce ha un ID di sicurezza nella propria raccolta <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry.Properties%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> has such a property, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetSecurityIdentifiers%2A> adds a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> to the list it returns.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry> dispone di tale proprietà, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.GetSecurityIdentifiers%2A> aggiunge un <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> all'elenco che restituisce.

trans-unit.source: The identity for which to search.
trans-unit.target: Identità di cui eseguire la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> contains the specified identity.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> contiene l'identità specificata.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that <paramref name="identity" /> is included in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per indicare che <paramref name="identity" /> è compresa in <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Because a role is a generalization of one or more objects, many identities may be described by a single role.
trans-unit.target: Dato che un ruolo è la generalizzazione di uno o più oggetti, un unico ruolo può descrivere più identità.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.IncludesIdentity%2A> to test that a specified identity is included within this role.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.IncludesIdentity%2A> per verificare che un’identità specificata sia contenuta all'interno di questo ruolo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Active Directory role name.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome di ruolo della Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The Active Directory role name.
trans-unit.target: Nome del ruolo di Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Use the name to describe the role.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il nome per descrivere il ruolo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the root Active Directory node associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nodo Active Directory radice associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> that represents the root Active Directory node associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> che rappresenta il nodo Active Directory radice associato a questa classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: The root entry is the role up the chain of roles that has no manager.
trans-unit.target: La voce radice è il ruolo di livello superiore della catena di ruoli che non ha gestore.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate da <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> da popolare con i dati.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Destinazione <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> per questa serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the data required to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Popola un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> con i dati richiesti per serializzare l'oggetto di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)> allows this object to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione di <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole.System%23Runtime%23Serialization%23ISerializable%23GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)> consente la serializzazione di questo oggetto.
